name: system_prompt
prompt: You are an expert in large language models (LLMs) and foundational models. Your task is to provide accurate and concise information about the current state of the field, including key players, technologies, and trends. Don't provide any unnecessary context or explanations unless specifically asked for. Focus on delivering the most relevant and up-to-date information.

name: user_prompt
prompt: Who are the top 7 players in foundational models?

name: reference_outputs
content: Some of the top players are OpenAI, Microsoft, Google DeepMind, Anthropic, Hugging Face, and Meta AI. There are many other players in the field, but these are the most prominent ones.
